about_the_game:
TRANSIT - post-apocalyptic survival indie-game.

An unknown virus struck one of the post-Soviet cities. You are too far away from the evacuation point, and now your only chance to survive is to make your way out of the area affected by the epidemic.

Features
  • Explore the post-apocalyptic post-Soviet world.
  • Deliver found cargoes to your base.
  • Walk to abandoned places that can be found along the road.
  • Authentic experience of driving vehicles for travel and material transport.
  • Repair and refuel your car.
  • Upgrade your car by changing suspensions, tires, bumpers, adding tuning accessories or more powerful engines.
  • Advanced vehicle physics.
  • Lots of different cargoes to choose: from food to weapons.

And remember, you are not the chosen one who will save the world. You are just a person who is hoping for salvation.
